document_data.mainbody:
House Ebsar was a drow house of Sschindylryn in the 15 century DR.
During the Darkening in the mid-1480s DR, House Ebsar refused to join an alliance with Szind, Avithoul, and DunRobar that caused the Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar. As the war was dictated by Lolth and planned by High Priestess Hekta Szind in order to find the Thread of the Weave, this was considered a grave insult to be avenged later.
